Professional land surveyors provide data for the GIS and use the data to provide more accurate, and less expensive surveys. The advancement of GIS has resulted in a demand from clients of land survey firms to have all of their digital data delivered in a GIS format creating a need for many small and mid-sized firms to build and maintain a GIS department.
